ability.Mud Armor: Reduces damage taken from physical attacks by 50% when HP is below 50%.
ability.Sludge Trap: Lower the speed of the attacker by 1 stage, when hit by a Water-type move.

Sludge Spit.effect: Traps the target for five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/8 of its maximum HP at the end of each turn during effect.

Mud Roll.effect: Increases the user's Defense by 1 stage.

Swamp Wave.effect: Reduces the speed of all non-Ground-type Pokemon by 2 stages and heals all Water-type Pokemon by 1/4 of their maximum HP.
